idea-plugin.name: Gradle Jumper
idea-plugin.description:
Gradle is recently introducing more and more typesafe accessors:

  • version catalog accessors (for example libs.kotlin.stdlib)
  • precompiled script plugin accessors (for example `my-custom-plugin`)

It is sometimes tempting to Ctrl/Cmd + Click on such accessor and expect to jump into the right place. Instead, IDE leads us to the generated code which makes up the accessor.

This plugin is here to help! Check out the quick demo above ;)
